name: JettFuel
summary: In JettFuel, you play as Jett: a robot used by a factory until its sudden closure. You managed to escape the factory before it was destroyed, but the whereabouts of your brother and fellow coworker Brody, are unknown. In order to reunite with Brody, Jett must collect the Power Gems, which are scattered across many different areas, with some being held by bosses. The gems give the user the power to make one wish. There are also 3 hidden Caged Whisps, creatures made of pure light. in the game to try to find!
